specialtyDrinks.name: Golden Hour Glow
specialtyDrinks.description: A warm, sunset-hued drink with a perfect balance of sweet & zesty. **Chef’s Special**

specialtyDrinks.name: Berry Breeze
specialtyDrinks.description: A refreshing blend of sweet hand-picked strawberries and tart lemonade.

specialtyDrinks.name: Fiesta del Sol
specialtyDrinks.description: A bold drink blended with fresh citrus, a touch of honey, and sparkling water capturing the energy of a Mexican celebration with a zesty kick and a hint of spice.

soupsSalads.name: Tropical Tango
soupsSalads.description: A refreshing blend of chickpeas and citrus fruits, offering a zesty twist to your meal.

soupsSalads.name: Tuscan Garden Salad
soupsSalads.description: A refreshing mix of crunchy kale and cucumbers complemented with a mix of peppery arugula and sun-dried tomatoes, garnished with our home-made lemon vinaigrette.

soupsSalads.name: Golden Thai Coconut Curry Soup
soupsSalads.description: An aromatic balance of sweet, savory, and spicy infused with freshly creamed coconut milk and bold Thai spices. **Chef’s Special**

appetizers.name: Sun-Kissed Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Crisp and vibrant blend of pan-seared red pepper feta and fresh tomato basil garnished with lemon zest.

appetizers.name: Smokey Skewers
appetizers.description: Skewered cubes of halloumi cheese, served with a drizzle of olive oil and lemon juice.

appetizers.name: Rustic Root Tostadas
appetizers.description: Crunchy tostada shells topped with smoky black beans, perfectly roasted zucchini, topped with creamy avocado.

appetizers.name: Buffalo Cauliflower Bites
appetizers.description: Perfectly crispy, golden-brown bite-sized cauliflower tossed with a homemade zesty buffalo sauce.

entrees.name: Mediterranean Street Bowl
entrees.description: A colorful combination of fluffy quinoa with fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, and topped with the Green Platter’s special tzatziki sauce.

entrees.name: Siam Serenade
entrees.description: A vibrant, savory stir fry with tofu and vegetables in a creamy, tangy peanut sauce.

entrees.name: Sushi Verde
entrees.description: Buttery avocado slices delicately set atop beautifully seasoned rice garnished with a hint of tangy soy sauce and spicy wasabi.

entrees.name: Bibimbap
entrees.description: A Korean rice bowl with sautéed mixed vegetables and a dollop of chili paste.

desserts.name: Rose Panna Cotta
desserts.description: A silky delicacy, infused with a subtle fragrant rosewater and garnished with crunchy pistachio crumble and saffron.

desserts.name: Earl Grey Crème Brûlée
desserts.description: A luxuriously crafted creamy vegetarian custard infused with citrusy Earl Grey tea and a perfectly caramelized crust.
